posts.postText:
In-Game Name:                        Liquid Chalupa {Omaga} 
Steam ID:                               STEAM_0:1:25214822
Reason:                                  Using FapHack
Length of Ban:                         Permanent
What server were you playing?:   TTT
Who banned you?:                    Pseudopseudohypoparathyroidism
Why should we unban you?:       
I was my brother who downloaded and used the hacks on the server, I don't want to be permabaned for something he did. I will not let him hack on my account ever again, nor will I ever hack on NNJG servers. I am sorry for what my brother did and I want to continue playing on NNJG.
I do beleive his story. He's been with us for so long and would never want to leave NNJG, if he should get any punishment at all it should be a 15 minute ban so he has time to beat his brother.

>> I do beleive his story. He's been with us for so long and would never want to leave NNJG, if he should get any punishment at all it should be a 15 minute ban so he has time to beat his brother. 

agree

I love Omaga D:

>> I do beleive his story. He's been with us for so long and would never want to leave NNJG, if he should get any punishment at all it should be a 15 minute ban so he has time to beat his brother. 

Already Done

Too fucking bad, garry added vac and unless your brother made the scriptenforcer bypass himself, that account will be vac banned within a month.

No point in an unban, and I'm not going to unban a scriptkiddie. Don't take your brother off his leash, jeez. You should know better.
I'm happy that I deleted the faphacks Gash. like a month ago :)

>> I'm happy that I deleted the faphacks Gash. like a month ago :)

Sv_scriptenforcer dll will get you banned
Dll used to cheat that is public will get you banned
LSS will get you banned
Cheat engine will get you banned
gmcl_deco will get you banned
gm_scriptenforcer will get you banned
gm_bbot will get you banned
